function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Participants sharing photos from their homes may not follow proper hygiene and safety measures, increasing the risk of contagious disease propagation.","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases and increased health risks for participants and others exposed to the photos.","Mitigation":"Provide guidelines for safe photo-taking practices and educate participants on the importance of following hygiene protocols while taking photos.","Technologies":"None specified","People":"Participants, individuals exposed to the photos","Owner":"Research organizers, health and safety authorities"},{"Description":"In-person data collection and analysis may expose researchers and participants to contagious diseases.","Impact":"Increased risk of infection and potential health hazards for researchers and participants.","Mitigation":"Implement remote data collection methods and prioritize virtual analysis of the collected data to minimize in-person interaction.","Technologies":"Remote data collection tools, virtual meeting platforms","People":"Researchers, participants","Owner":"Research organizers, data analysts"},{"Description":"Inadequate handling of data analysis tools and software may lead to errors in interpreting health-related data.","Impact":"Potential misinformation and incorrect analysis of health data, leading to misguided conclusions and recommendations.","Mitigation":"Provide training on the proper use of data analysis tools and software, and establish quality control measures to verify the accuracy of the analysis.","Technologies":"SPSS software, Stata software","People":"Data analysts, researchers","Owner":"Research organizers, data analysis experts"}]}
